Posts.EditableText:
[url=http://www.1and1.com:2w3kkxgc]http://www.1and1.com[/url:2w3kkxgc]

I came across this on some other forums and thought I'd share it here for anyone interested.

You get free for three years: 
500mb's storage space
5gb monthly transfer limit
php, mysql, cgi, etc.
FTP access


Sign up is pretty simple, enter your information, get a confirmation email, enter your 10 digit phone number(us and canada hurray, sorry uk FIX YOUR TEETH!), recieve a call from an automated service(no human interaction necessary) with a pin number, enter pin number on website, await (yet another) confirmation email, and you're set up. No credit card required to sign up(very cool).

So far the only thing I don't really like about the service is it takes a little while(an hour) to change where domains point and such, other than that, pretty good for free(can't complain at that price).  Eh, try it out if you need some webspace.
